name: austin-tiy-build-tool
description: A basic build tool for developing and deploying basic SPAs with support for SCSS, ES6/7/JSX, and gh-pages or surge deployment

scripts.clean-css: if [ -f 'dist/main.css' ]; then rm dist/main.css; fi && if [ -f 'dist/main.css.map' ]; then rm dist/main.css.map; fi
scripts.build-dist: if [ ! -d dist ]; then mkdir dist; fi
scripts.build-html: npm run build-dist && npm run clean-html && if [ -f 'app/index.html' ]; then cp app/index.html dist/index.html; else echo you must have an index.html file; fi
scripts.build-assets: npm run build-dist && npm run clean-assets && if [ -d 'app/assets' ]; then cp -r app/assets dist; fi
scripts.build-css: npm run build-dist && npm run clean-css && if [ -f 'app/scss/main.scss' ]; then sass app/scss/main.scss:dist/main.css; else echo you must have a scss directory with a main.scss in your app to compile css; fi
scripts.build-scripts: npm run build-dist && npm run clean-scripts && if [ -f 'app/scripts/entry.js' ]; then browserify app/scripts/entry.js -d -v --outfile dist/main.js; else echo you must have a scripts directory with an entry.js in your app to compile js; fi
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build-html && npm run build-assets && npm run build-css && npm run build-scripts
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch-html' 'npm run watch-assets' 'npm run watch-sass' 'npm run watch-scripts'
scripts.dev-server-watch: npm run dev-server-start && onchange 'dist/**/*.*' -- npm run dev-server-start
scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run dev-server-watch'
scripts.prebuild:
if [ ! -d app ]; then mkdir app; fi && if [ ! -f app/index.html ]; then printf '<!DOCTYPE html>%s
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<title></title>
		<link media="screen" href="main.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
	</head>
	<body>

		<script src="main.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
	</body>
</html>' >> app/index.html; fi && if [ ! -d app/scripts ]; then mkdir app/scripts; fi && if [ ! -f app/scripts/entry.js ]; then touch app/scripts/entry.js; fi && if [ ! -d app/scss ]; then mkdir app/scss; fi && if [ ! -f app/scss/main.scss ]; then touch app/scss/main.scss; fi && if [ ! -d app/assets ]; then mkdir app/assets; fi
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.preinstall: if ! command -v http-server; then npm install -g http-server; fi

author: nicerhugs
